title: Google Play Store showing more app info without having to open listings
content:
In addition to a slew of new developer features at I/O 2022, Google is testing a Play Store tweak on Android that lets users see more information about apps without having to open the full listing.

moreâ€¦

The post Google Play Store showing more app info without having to open listings appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Google is testing a Play Store tweak on Android that lets users see more information about listings directly from the main Apps feed...
